text: YOU: Hey Harsh, can you tell me more about Mihir's technical skills? HARSH: Sure! Mihir is well-versed in various programming languages including Python, JavaScript, C, and C++. He also has experience with frameworks like React and Node.js. In terms of cybersecurity, he's familiar with tools such as Wireshark, Metasploit, and Nmap. YOU: Impressive! Thanks for the insights, Harsh. HARSH: No problem, happy to help!
notMyTurn: HARSH: I think Sanya wanted to talk to you...
